# This test verifies that line numbers are included in module import errors.
# Verifies golang.org/issue/34393.

go list -e -deps -f '{{with .Error}}{{.Pos}}: {{.Err}}{{end}}' ./main
stdout 'bad[/\\]bad.go:3:8: malformed module path "ğŸ§.example.com/string": invalid char ''ğŸ§'''

-- go.mod --
module m

go 1.13

-- main/main.go --
package main

import _ "m/bad"

func main() {}

-- bad/bad.go --
package bad

import _ "ğŸ§.example.com/string"
